articles.author: Siyanda Mthethwa
articles.title: South African mother given life sentence for trafficking 6-year-old daughter - USA Today
articles.description: A South African mother and two accomplices were sentenced to life imprisonment for trafficking her then-6-year-old daughter.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, May 29 (Reuters) - A South African mother and two accomplices were sentenced to life imprisonment on Thursday for trafficking her then-6-year-old daughter, in a case that gained nationw… [+1007 chars]
